name: Van Pershing
description:
Zombies, Werewolfes, Frankenstein Monsters and YOU ... with fully loaded Shotgun

-4 different sceneries: Cemetery, Catacombs, Transylvania, Dracula’s Castle
-40 levels, 2 difficulty modes
-Visit shop with Charming Lady always more than happy to help you.
Buy and upgrade marvellous weapons such as Shotgun, Gatling, Bazooka, Circullar Saw, Magic Fireball, Holy Water Sprayer, medecines, shields, and more…
-Van Pershing is OpenFeint Enabled
